name: OrcaCast vPhase2 (composite)
short_desc: Weekly relative sighting likelihood across the selected grid.
long_desc: Composite ranker trained on baseline forecast signals and temporal structure. Optimized for top-k discovery (not calibrated probabilities). Best overall on recent evaluation runs.

name: Spatiotemporal RF
short_desc: Non-linear model capturing spatial + temporal interactions.
long_desc: Random Forest with spatiotemporal feature blocks (lags, rolling, neighbor aggregates). Strong recall in active seasons; can over-expand in sparse weeks.

name: Neighbor climatology
short_desc: Baseline smoothing sightings into nearby hexes.
long_desc: Spatial smoothing baseline. Surprisingly competitive for ranking because it captures local persistence without overfitting. Useful sanity check.

name: Exponential smoothing
short_desc: Temporal baseline that projects recent activity forward.
long_desc: Univariate smoothing on per-cell activity. Great for capturing momentum, weak when spatial spread matters. Good baseline for time-only behavior.
